title: Microsoft says a cyber threat actor has been able to access internal systems
text:
Log In   English (USA) English (UK) English (Canada) English (India) Deutsch (Deutschland) Deutsch (Österreich) Deutsch (Schweiz) Español Français (France) Français (Suisse) Italiano Nederlands (Nederland) Nederlands (België)   English (USA) English (UK) English (Canada) English (India) Deutsch (Deutschland) Deutsch (Österreich) Deutsch (Schweiz) Español Français (France) Français (Suisse) Italiano Nederlands (Nederland) Nederlands (België) March 8 (Reuters) - Microsoft said on Friday a
cyber threat actor Midnight Blizzard has been able access to
some of the company's source code repositories and internal
systems after an attack that was detected in January.
(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru; Editing by Shilpi
